posts.post_title: WTB: a couple of T-206 cards
posts.post_content:
Posted By: samuel
I'm looking for bender (no trees) and beckley, as well as any southern leaguers. raw and in poor condition. common backs.

posts.post_title: WTB: a couple of T-206 cards
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Adam
Samuel - I have not got around to scanning and posting them on Net 54 yet, but I have 2 low grade (PSA 1s) T206 Southern Leaguers for sale -- King ($60, shipping included) and Hart (Little Rock) ($70, shipping included).  I also have an Orth, but that is a PSA 2 ($70, shipping included).  

You could crack them out of the slabs and they would become raw!  

Please email me at aamoniz@yahoo.com if you have any interest.  I would also trade any for a T206 Ed Foster.

Good luck with your search!

Regards,
Adam
